Articles.Content:
Windows 8.1 64x , KSP 1.0

When using the small fixed landing gear LY-01 and steerable landing gear LY-05 on an airplane in the SPH, the engineer's report warns :"Landing missing !"

I was able to reproduce this bug every time i tried it. (in sanbox, don't know about career)

Steps for reproduction :

-go to SPH

-create any airplane

-attach the landing gear mentioned above

-check the engineer's report

Picture :

players discovering the new Engineer's report feature might find this somehow... derpy.

I noticed that too in career.

It also told me I had no electric power generation to power my antenna, when the basic jet engine is supposed to be able to generate electric power.
